cheeses.name: cheddar
cheeses.description: Tangy and sharp, this cheese pairs well with apples and pears.

cheeses.name: mozzarella
cheeses.description: This is a fresh, mild cheese, delicious with tomatoes and basil.

cheeses.name: swiss
cheeses.description: This sharp, nutty cheese pairs well with cured meats and mustard.

cheeses.name: provolone
cheeses.description: This is a mild italian cheese.

cheeses.name: gouda
cheeses.description: This dutch-style cheese is a nutty, rich cheese that pairs beaufitully with sweet mustard and pickles.

cheeses.name: havarti
cheeses.description: This is a mild, versatile cheese perfect for snacking or sandwiches.

cheeses.name: muenster
cheeses.description: This orange-rinded classic is salty and mild.

cheeses.name: brie
cheeses.description: This pungent french cheese is a wonderful addition to any cheese board.

cheeses.name: curds
cheeses.description: Known as squeaky cheese, these can be made from cheddar, muenster, or other cheeses, and are often flavored or deep fried.

cheeses.name: halloumi
cheeses.description: Halloumi is a young, salty cheese often grilled or fried and topped with herbs.

cheeses.name: chevre
cheeses.description: This is a soft, tangy goat cheese delicious with fruit and bread, or olive oil and herbs.

cheeses.name: feta
cheeses.description: This salty, tangy cheese can be made from sheep, goat, or cow milk.

cheeses.name: gruyere
cheeses.description: This flavorful, buttery cheese pairs well with grapes and stonefruit.

cheeses.name: parmesan
cheeses.description: This aged, rinded cheese is crumbly and savory and pairs well with tangy and acidic foods like tomatoes.

cheeses.name: bleu
cheeses.description: This cheese is known for its pungent flavor and pairs well with dark chocolate and hazelnuts.
